element-citation.article-title: Comprehensive panel of real-time TaqMan™ polymerase chain reaction assays for detection and absolute quantification of filoviruses, arenaviruses, and New World hantaviruses

ref.mixed-citation: .Trombley AR, Wachter L, Garrison J, Buckley-Beason VA, Jahrling J, Hensley LE, et al. The American journal of tropical medicine and hygiene. 2010;82(5):954-60.
